note:
Obed Ladiny is author of 4 poetry books and lives in Brooklyn New York. His works have appeared in journals such as Red Fez, In Between Hangovers, Torrid Literature Journal, Open Arts Forum, more.

Follow him at Open Arts Forum and on Instagram @ladiny_poetry_writing_life. If you've picked up one of his poetry collections, please remember to rate and leave a review on the Amazon platform, so that others can discover his works.
